title: Leon.The.Professional.Uncut.And.Extended - AliaIactaEst
description:
AliaIactaEst

Hello all:

I wanted to share with you an awesome film from Luc Besson.  The Extended Cut of Leon:The Professional.  Recut with over 24 miniutes of additional footage cut from the American release, presumeably because it accentuates the father/daughter relationship aspect between sensitive killer, Leon, and the young 12 year old girl, Matilda.

Professional assassin Leon reluctantly takes care of 12-year-old Mathilda, a neighbor whose parents are killed, and teaches her his trade.  Superb filmmaking and tense action compliment a tender relationship between a lonely hitman, and an emotionally damaged girl.

Wicked stuff - and belongs in any respectable library.

Video: .avi 
Audio: mp3 
Aspect: 2.35:1 
Quality: High 

If you liked this torrent, please leave a quality comment, and help me to seed...

Enjoy!

AliaIactaEst
